short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OnMyShoppingList is an extension that helps you save time and money!.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛒 Your Shopping Assistant, Simplified! On My Shopping List makes creating and managing your shopping lists a breeze. Perfect for groceries, online shopping, or any must-have items, this extension helps you:
✍️ Create Lists Quickly: Add items to your shopping list with just a few clicks.
✅ Check Off Items: Easily track what you’ve purchased and what’s left to buy.
📌 Organize Your Needs: Group items by categories like groceries, clothing, or tech gadgets.
🌐 Sync Across Devices: Access and edit your lists anywhere—at home or on the go.
🔔 Stay Reminded: Set notifications so you never forget an important item.
$ Affiliation links: We use affiliate links to support our efforts and ensuring new and better versions for better user experience.
✨ Say goodbye to scattered notes and forgotten items. With On My Shopping List, your shopping trips (online or in-store) are more efficient and stress-free!
